original_text: Because of all my troubles, I seem to be in a very dark place. The darkness seems to cover me. But I will not be afraid to speak. Because of all my troubles,
korean_text: 이는 내가 두려워하는 것이 어둠 때문이나 흑암이 내 얼굴을 가렸기 때문이 아니로다

sentences.original_text: I seem to be in a very dark place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 매우 어두운 곳에 있는 것 같습니다

sentences.original_text: The darkness seems to cover me
But I will not be afraid to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 말할 것을 두려워하지 않을 것입니다
